verses.roman:
sei kāle se yavanera eka anucara
'uḍiyā-kaṭake' āila kari' veśāntara

synonyms: sei kāle—at that time; se yavanera—of the Mohammedan governor; eka anucara—one follower; uḍiyā-kaṭake—to the camp of Orissan soldiers; āila—came; kari' veśa-antara—changing the dress.
translation: At that time, a follower of the Mohammedan governor arrived at the Orissa encampment dressed in disguise.
